name: Vendetta
description: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice seems unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands and sets out on a quest for retribution.

review.author: john_carlin
review.heading: Basically a rip off of death sentence
review.reviewBody: This is basically just a rip off of James Wan's death sentence. Death sentence is wayyyy better, if you haven't seen it skip this and just watch death sentence.

keywords: one person army action,justice,female nudity,daughter,street thug
